DonateBlock.body: Do you like the Voting Monitor? Please support its creation!
DonateBlock.title: Support the Creation of the Voting Monitor!

FooterMultiWord.body-who-to-vote: The Voting Monitor compares your opinions with party programs.

GuidePage.not-included: This question will not be considered in the results calculation
GuidePage.skip-question: If you have no opinion on the topic or do not want to answer, you can move on using the arrow on the right. This question will not be considered in the results calculation.
GuidePage.text-0: If a party did not answer or has no clear stance (abstains), the answer will not be evaluated.
GuidePage.text-important: Topics important to the respondent can be marked with a star. These are calculated with double weight.
GuidePage.text-method: If an answer matches a party's answer, it earns one point. If the answers are opposite, one point is deducted.

czech-version.prefix: In the meantime, you can check out the {0}

IndexPage.disclaimer: By submitting, you agree to receive notifications about the Voting Monitor.
IndexPage.error: An error occurred :( Please try again.
IndexPage.inform-me: Notify me about new Voting Monitors
IndexPage.input-text: Sign up and we'll notify you when a new Voting Monitor is launched.
IndexPage.primary-text: We are preparing a voting calculator for the 2023 Slovak National Council elections.
IndexPage.secondary-text: Enter your email address and we will notify you when the Voting Monitor is available.
IndexPage.title: Voting Monitor

AuthPageVue.notification: Your personal data will be processed for the purpose of creating a user profile, in accordance with the
AuthPageVue.opinion: Track your opinion development in your profile

EmailAuthPageVue.message-verification-first: We will send you an email with a verification link. Complete the registration by clicking on it.
EmailAuthPageVue.message-verification-second: We will send you an email with a verification link.

EmailFormPageVue.about-spam: If you did not receive the email with the verification link, please check your spam or junk folder.
EmailFormPageVue.confirm-info: Confirm your registration in your email
EmailFormPageVue.error-email: The email address is not in the correct format
EmailFormPageVue.login-info: We will send you an email with a verification link.
EmailFormPageVue.notification-info: Confirm your login in your email
EmailFormPageVue.registration-info: We will send you an email with a verification link. Complete the registration by clicking on it.

ProfileSettingsPage.confirm-delete-profile: Are you sure you want to delete the profile?
ProfileSettingsPage.notification-delete-profile: Deleting the profile will permanently remove the saved calculators.

RecapPage.hint-text: Review and adjust your answers and weights

ResultPage.text-and-answer: and answer at least one question or
ResultPage.text-at-least-one-answer: You must answer at least one question to see the results
ResultPage.text-in-time: Track how your opinions and results change over time.
ResultPage.text-save-calc: save your results and compare them over time.

ResultShareModal.text-copy: ... or click here to copy the link
ResultShareModal.text-do-it-too: These are my results, fill it out too!
ResultShareModal.text-my-match: According to the Voting Monitor, the following are closest to me:

SharePage.text-fill-again: To fill out the Voting Monitor again, click the button in the top right corner
